content: We have an IG that needs a new code that was added to the latest version of a code system that was originally published in FHIR, but has been migrated to THO: https://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem-measure-scoring.html. I can see that the code system is present in tx.fhir.org, but it is the original version published as part of the spec. I can also see that there is a terminology service option to the publisher, but it's documented as only working with tx.fhir.org right now. Is there a way to get the publisher to make use of the updated code systems in THO?
